index.name: Brice Williams
index.bio: Brice and Bob are senior application security consultants with SysLogicâ€™s Managed Security Advisory Services, each with 20 years of experience in software development and security best practices. They provide cybersecurity guidance and support to large global organizations that includes secure development programs, developer training, security tools, source code assessments, and secure architecture. They are active participants in cybersecurity meetups and contribute to industry working groups such as the OWASP .NET and Application Security Verification Standard (ASVS) projects.
